name: AliénorEU
goal:
AliénorEU is a European policies' consulting agency.
Our activities in our different fields of expertise (Agriculture, Forestry, Animal Welfare, Raw materials and waste, Fisheries and Maritime Affairs, EU Research and projects):
- Monitoring EU and international developments
- EU networking
- EU funding opportunities consultancy
- Organisation of events
- Interest representation
- Organisation of debates and training sessions
- Building partnerships under EU Projects
- Institutional communication services
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Customs, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Trade, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Policies concerning: Agriculture, Forestry, Animal Welfare, Raw materials and waste, Fisheries and Maritime Affairs, EU Research, Transport and projects.
customers: Aquaculture Advisory Council,European Federation of Foie Gras (Euro Foie Gras)
